name: Face Reveal
tag_list: share, secret, gossip, fun, make-friends, social-network, girlfriends, love, kiss
overview:
You can share here what you cannot share anywhere else.

• Facereveal is a social networking site to make online friends and share your secrets, gossips, facts in an impersonal way and have lot of fun. • You can share here what you cannot share anywhere else. Even discuss your problems which you hesitate to talk about with your relatives and friends in the real world. • Get suggestions and solutions from your friends and followers on Facereveal.com. • You can read others’ reveals and know their secrets. Suggest them a way out. • The more you reveal yourself the more points you earn on reveal meter, which makes you star and brings you more friends on Facereveal.com. • Connect with other users and send them unlimited private messages. • Mail and share reveals with your friends in real world if you prefer.
